high_descs: turn to the left and move forward across the room to the glass door, turn to the left and move forward to the three colored rags on the floor on the floor
pick up the gray rag from the floor
move forward to the shelf above the rags on the floor
put the gray rag on to the shelf
anns.task_desc: put a gray rag on the shelf

high_descs: Turn left and walk until you hit the door then turn left and walk to the cubbies on the wall.
Pick up the black cloth on the floor.
Look up at the cubby on the wall.
Put the black cloth in the cubby.
anns.task_desc: Put a black cloth in a cubby.

high_descs: Turn left, hang a left at the wall and walk to the wooden shelves ahead.
Pick up the gray towel on the floor in front of the wooden shelves.
Look up at the wooden shelves next to the wall.
Put the gray towel in the middle of the bottom right shelf.
anns.task_desc: Place a towel on a shelf.
